name: Wow! What a Small World!
description:
High School was a long time ago, now you've got a job in the city. You're ready to start your adult life. All would be well if it weren't for the fact that all your coworkers seem to be people you knew in high school!

Don't make a bad impression on your first day and try to remember treir name.

Controls: everything with your keyboard.

Made in GameMaker for LD38. (theme: Small World)
